name: Homer Jay Simpson
title: Safety Inspector
aboutme: I love beer, doughnuts, and all things fried.

projects.name: Boxcar Racer
projects.description: Helped Bart build a boxcar racer, but Martin's was better.

experience.title: Safety Inspector
experience.responsibilities: Build high quality web applications using JavaScript, Java, ColdFusion for our clients. I also evaluate and educate the development team on new techniques and technologies. High-level application design including technologies, frameworks, and coding practices.
experience.achievements: Introduced unit testing, continuous integration, source control, and development best practices to the team.  Started the Lunch and Learn program where team members teach each other new technologies and techniques. Lead development teams of up to 5 developers on profitable development projects.

education.achievements: Ran over dean with car, kidnapped Sir Oinks-a-lot.
